actions.text: On agreeing to the Miller (NC) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 238 (Roll no. 616).

description: Amendment sought to require specific disclosure of information related to filing agency petitions to the Financial Stability Oversight Council to overturn Consumer Financial Protection Bureau rulemaking.
purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 112-172 to require specific disclosure of information related to filing agency petitions to the Financial Stability Oversight Council to overturn Consumer Financial Protection Bureau rulemaking.
